    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method serves as the entry point for the Aircraft Database Management System application. It provides a simple command-line interface to interact with the system.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments (not used).

      • validateConnectionAndSetup

        private static boolean validateConnectionAndSetup(java.lang.String url,
                                                  java.lang.String user,
                                                  java.lang.String password)
        Validates the connection and sets up the database.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL of the database.
        user - The database user.
        password - The database password.
        Returns:
        true if the connection is successful and the database is set up, false otherwise.
